section.para: The ngx_http_autoindex_module module processes requests ending with the slash character (‘/’) and produces a directory listing. Usually a request is passed to the ngx_http_autoindex_module module when the ngx_http_index_module module cannot find an index file.

directive.name: autoindex
directive.para: Enables or disables the directory listing output.

directive.name: autoindex_exact_size
directive.para: For the HTML format, specifies whether exact file sizes should be output in the directory listing, or rather rounded to kilobytes, megabytes, and gigabytes.

directive.name: autoindex_format
directive.para: Sets the format of a directory listing.
When the JSONP format is used, the name of a callback function is set with the callback request argument. If the argument is missing or has an empty value, then the JSON format is used.

directive.name: autoindex_localtime
directive.para: For the HTML format, specifies whether times in the directory listing should be output in the local time zone or UTC.
